        Get the detected vision target, or null if none found

      • getCameraTranslation

        public CameraTranslation getCameraTranslation()
        Get the camera translation, or null if not possible. NOTE: This feature must be enabled in the Limelight settings
        Returns:
        Camera translation

      • getPipelineID

        public int getPipelineID()
        Get the true active pipeline ID (0 to 9)
        Returns:
        Pipeline ID

      • getXCorners

        public double[] getXCorners()
        Get an array of corner X coordinates. "Send Contours" must be enabled on the Limelight
        Returns:
        Corner X coords

      • getYCorners

        public double[] getYCorners()
        Get an array of corner Y coordinates. "Send Contours" must be enabled on the Limelight
        Returns:
        Corner Y coords
